description:
************************

Great News due to the great response on this course. I am uploading more video to this course in the coming weeks. It start with 7 lesson but as you can see now I have added more video to the course. And more to come. If you find it good, please enroll and leave a review.

************************

The following is just a guide to the art of palm reading. In order to gain valuable insight your palm needs to be read by a professional.
This course will teach you all you ever need to read a palm


The Head Line
The head line is the most important line in the hand, as this gives an indication of a persons mentality and intellectual development. Marks on the line will show sickness and accidents to the brain and head. The normal position of the line starts from between the index and thumb and runs horizontally across the hand


The Heart Line
The normal position for the heart lines starts from between the index finger and second finger and curves across the palm ending just below the small finger on the side of the hand. This line shows the emotional influences of the individual. It will give insights into the affection they will give, and wish to receive, and also show the action of the heart and diseases.


The Life Line
The normal position of the life line starts from under the mount of jupiter from the side of the hand encircling the mount of venus around the base of the thumb. That is why the palmist will examine the line closely to see if there is any changes in the position and also looks for markings on the line.


The Fate Line
The normal position of the line starts from the wrist and runs along the center of the hand and ends under the second finger. The fate line is one of the most important of the secondary lines, but marks along this line will indicate a persons directions, successes, failures and obstacles in life. Influences to the career and must be taken in relationship with the three main lines.


Take Charge of your life. Take charge of your own career, health and your love life. Enroll now. Class Start now.
title: Palmistry: Learn the Basics for All Aspects of Your Life!
